subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: <check><on-true>Subscribing to this course adds it to your course list.</on-true><on-false>Subscribing to this course adds it to your course list. By subscribing, you grant permission to the (current and future) teachers of this course to view your progress within the course. You can always undo this by unsubscribing from the course.</on-false></check>

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.description: <count-check><zero>This course has no teachers at the moment.</zero><not-zero>This course is taught by <word-list/>.</not-zero></count-check>

learningGoals.title: Learning goals
learningGoals.description: The course has the following final <count-check><one>goal</one><not-one>goals</not-one></count-check>.

student.gradeEstimate: Based on your practice so far, we expect a score of roughly {percentage} (about {lowerPercentage} - {upperPercentage}) on the final test.
student.disclaimer: No rights can be derived from this estimate.
student.practiceRecommendation: This is currently the recommended skill to practice.
student.sufficientMastery: You have sufficiently mastered this skill.
student.followUpMastery: You have mastered a follow-up skill, so we mark this one as sufficient as well.
student.noExercises: This skill has no exercises yet. They are probably coming soon.
student.noSkills: This block is still under development: no skills/exercises have been added yet. They will be here shortly!
